task.title: Create a Start of Day Task Job
task.shortdesc: The Start of Day Task job creates timesheet records and runs pay rules, ensuring items such as holiday hours, exempt employee hours, and time off from Time Off and Allowances appear on the timesheet when it is first accessed. This job should be run daily.

context.note: Since this job affects important records and pay rules, open a support case via the Customer Success Portal if you need assistance.

image.alt: Create a Start of Day Task Job

step.cmd: Enter Start of Day Task as the name and description.
Select Start of Day as the job type.
Select Yes to enable the schedule, and select Exact as the schedule type.
Check the applicable days of the week and enter the time.
Enter the number of days to look back and forward. The recommended setting is "forward" weekly (once every seven days).
